page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN COOKLEY
page.content: Most of the people who live in the area work locally. Some work on the farms raising cereal crops or sugar beet.A few are employed by the nurseries, though this is largely seasonal. The iron works, which was the reason for the growth of the village during the industrial revolution, still employs a large number of people. The Lea Castle Hospital, dealing with the mentally subnormal, also employs many of the villagers as ancillaries, nurses, therapists and doctors. There are also jobs to be found in the shops and pubs that serve the population.
